question: 祖父
sourceMnemonic: Your <kanji>ancestor</kanji> <kanji>father</kanji> isn't your father, it's the father that came before your father's generation, your <vocabulary>grandfather</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is all on'yomi, which is great for <ja>祖</ja> but not as great for <ja>父</ja>. To remember that this <ja>父</ja> is <ja>ふ</ja>, just think about how much of a <reading>foo</reading>l (<ja>ふ</ja>) your grandfather was, even if he wasn't.
